channel.title: CVE Feed for The Kubevirt project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Kubevirt project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-3841|2024-08-04T19:19:18.689Z -- the%20kubevirt%20project -- kubevirt%2Fvirt-cdi-importer
item.description: Kubevirt/virt-cdi-importer, versions 1.4.0 to 1.5.3 inclusive, were reported to disable TLS certificate validation when importing data into PVCs from container registries. This could enable man-in-the-middle attacks between a container registry and the virt-cdi-component, leading to possible undetected tampering of trusted container image content.
